message.content:
cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.DS, cs.PF 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - The paper deals with load balancing and communication cost in Content Delivery Networks (CDNs), which are network-based systems. 
2. cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) - The paper discusses load balancing and request mapping schemes in CDNs, which are distributed systems. 
3. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper formulates a stochastic optimization problem to formalize the trade-off between load balancing and communication cost in CDNs, which can be seen as a control problem. 
4. cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) - The paper proposes three heuristic mapping schemes for load balancing in CDNs, which involve algorithmic design and analysis. 
5. cs.PF (Performance) - The paper evaluates the performance of the proposed mapping schemes through extensive simulations, which is related to performance evaluation and optimization.
